SELECT
max(datepart(year,Out_time)) as dateTime,
MAX (CONVERT (VARCHAR(4),DatePart( YEAR, Out_time )) + '-' + CONVERT (VARCHAR(4),DatePart( MONTH, Out_time ))) AS dateTime,
max(CONVERT(varchar(100), Out_time, 23)) as dateTime,
COUNT(In_time) as inCarNum, COUNT(Out_time) as outCarNum, SUM(datediff(HOUR ,In_time,Out_time)) as parkTime, SUM( Fact_Cash ) as sumCase FROM TC_Earning
and Out_time between #{carSumVo.beginTime} and #{carSumVo.endTime}
and
datediff( year, Out_time, #{carSumVo.time} ) = 0
datediff( month, Out_time, #{carSumVo.time} ) = 0
datediff( day, Out_time, #{carSumVo.time} ) = 0
GROUP BY
datediff( year, Out_time, GETDATE() )
datediff( month, Out_time, GETDATE() )
datediff( day, Out_time, GETDATE() )
select count(1) num,datepart(hour,In_time) hourNum from Tc_InOutLs where datediff( day, In_time, GETDATE() ) = 0 GROUP BY datepart(hour,In_time)
select count(1) num,datepart(hour,Out_time) hourNum from Tc_InOutLs where datediff( day, Out_time, GETDATE() ) = 0 GROUP BY datepart(hour,Out_time)
